programmes.show_description: Action sequel, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. The bandana-wearing one-man army travels to Burma to rescue a party of missionaries from a sadistic military officer. (2008)
Sci-fi romp through space. When the leader of the evil Coalition threatens to annihilate a planet for its resources, his daughter turns against him to fight for what is right. (2019)
Welcome to LEGEND XTRA - your home for movies and series full of action, adventure, suspense and much more!
A man bets his garrulous acquaintance that he can't keep quiet for a full year. S2, Ep25
A man on death row is haunted by the belief that everyone around him is a figment of his recurring nightmare. S2, Ep26
Put the pleasure back into shopping from the comfort of your home and choose from a selection of innovative products.
A timid clerk discovers he can accomplish all he wants with the power of his mind. S2, Ep27
Could broken ice in a New England pond reveal the landing spot of a UFO? S2, Ep28
Dino-scares! When an accident leads to two genetically-recreated dinosaurs on the loose, a group of hired guns must capture them before they destroy everything in their path. (2020)
Welcome to LEGEND XTRA - your home for movies and series full of action, adventure, suspense and much more!
Action adventure starring Adrian Paul (Highlander). As an ex-commando and his family visit the coastal town of Pompeii, Mount Vesuvius is on the brink of eruption once more... (2014)
Welcome to LEGEND XTRA - your home for movies and series full of action, adventure, suspense and much more!
Post-apocalyptic thriller with Bill Paxton. Two officers transport a murderer to prison across ravaged lands, only for the criminal to be kidnapped by a mercenary hoping to claim the reward. (1989)
Colt travels to Philadelphia in pursuit of a white-collar criminal, who convinces him they should return by train. Richard Burton guest stars. S2, Ep6
Colt visits New York on an assignment to pick up a bail-jumper, but ends up spoiling the stakeout of a gangster. S2, Ep7
Colt tracks roller derby star Elizabeth 'Mad Dog' McClosky who's wanted by the police for assault and battery, but discovers that her coach Marv Jackson is the real villain. S2, Ep8
Colt helps a computer genius who has been framed for murder by the head of an illegal intelligence network. S2, Ep9
Colt's American football-playing cousin is kidnapped by a crooked Army sergeant and forced to boost the fortunes of an ailing team. S2, Ep10
Medieval drama with Charlton Heston. When an 11th-century knight falls for another man's wife, her vengeful spouse ignites a civil war by influencing the knight's brother to turn against him. (1965)
Unnerving horror. During an outbreak of a deadly plague, a mystical woman tries to save her community by conjuring an entity, however the creature she summons is a far greater threat. (2018)
Unsettling horror. A family wakes up on Christmas morning to discover they are trapped indoors, and receive a series of increasingly disturbing instructions through their television set. (2018)
Western starring Luke Perry. A sheriff stops at nothing to find the escaped criminal who murdered the sheriff's wife and son. (2008)

The sudden arrival of a riderless horse lures our heroes into the clutches of an evil wizard who wants to use Roxton for evil doing. S2, Ep5/22
Post-apocalyptic action with Dean Cain. When a meteor strike leaves the Earth covered in ice, a group of survivors set out across a desolate landscape to find a device that can save mankind. (2004)
Western adventure sequel with Kenny Rogers. Brady Hawkes sets out to find his son, who is on the run with outlaws Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid. Ep1
Welcome to LEGEND XTRA - your home for movies and series full of action, adventure, suspense and much more!
Chuck Norris fights crime and helps the community as the eponymous Walker. Walker tries to save a baby and ends up in a coma! S2, Ep5/25
Armageddon action! While the world endures a near-apocalyptic event, one family must use their skills and wit to reunite and survive. (2017)

An alien skeleton army takes over the bodies of Marguerite and other life forms in the jungle. S2, Ep6/22
Howie is fooled by a couple of car thieves who sell him a stolen vehicle to use in a stunt. Roy Rogers guest stars. S2, Ep11
Crime thriller starring Morgan Freeman. A thief in debt to the Russian mob persuades a rookie crook to help steal the last pair of original Faberge eggs. (2009)
Western with Rambo's Richard Crenna. After an attempt on his life, a man wakes up with no memory only to discover he's a gunslinger on a mission to avenge the deaths of his wife and child. (1973)
